result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. WAYNE J. MALONE

records.addlTxt:
9:18 AM Defendant WAYNE J. MALONE in court.  Attorney Gary Stephen Dodge Sr. in court for WAYNE J. MALONE.  Prosecuting attorney Gregory A. Parker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. Dodge asks for a FPT as he is awaiting an offer.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 21, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Final pre-trial on December 21, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Final pre-trial on October 5, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:33 AM Prosecuting attorney Gregory A. Parker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant WAYNE J. MALONE not in court.  Attorney Gary Stephen Dodge Sr. in court for WAYNE J. MALONE. State asks for $1500 warrant instate pickup. Court so orders.

11:13 All parties back in Court Room. Court vacates warrant and Atty. Dodge asks for an additional FPT.

records.descr: Answer to demand for discovery and inspection
Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor

records.addlTxt: Notice of Hearing- FPT on 08-05-2022 at 9am.

1:05 PM Defendant WAYNE J. MALONE in court.  Attorney Gary Stephen Dodge Sr. in court for WAYNE J. MALONE.  Attorney Laura Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty. Dodge Sr. enters not guilty pleas to all counts.

1:05 PM Defendant WAYNE J. MALONE in court.  Attorney Gary Stephen Dodge Sr. in court for WAYNE J. MALONE.  Attorney Laura Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense files with the Court a Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire & Waiver. Defense verbally waives the preliminary hearing.  Court advises party of their right to a preliminary hearing, accepts waiver and binds over for Arraignment. Per ADA Nelson, the INFO will mirror the c/c and will be filed within 10 days. Atty. Dodge Sr./defense waives the reading of the INFO and wishes to proceed directly into the ARGN today.
Final pre-trial scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.addlTxt: 03:11 PM Defendant WAYNE J. MALONE in court with attorney Gary Stephen Dodge.  Laura Nelson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. no travel outside the State without prior court approval, no contact with LMF 3-12-1972 directly or indirectly
No travel outside the state without prior court approval.  No contact with LMF 3-12-72 directly or indirectly.

01:45 PM Defendant WAYNE J. MALONE in court with attorney Carly Foor.  Defendant WAYNE J. MALONE in custody via zoom.    Gregory A. Parker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant does not qualify for PD services.  Yes, he does want an attorney. Defendant is not willing to waive time limits.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 25, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
